titles: Theorique and practise of warre. Written to Don Philip Prince of Castil, by Don Bernardino de Mendoza. Translated out of the Castilian tonge into Englishe, by Sr. Edwarde Hoby Knight. Directed to Sr. George Carew Knight
Theorica y practica de guerra. English
author: Mendoza, Bernardino de, 1540 or 41-1604.
Hoby, Edward, Sir, 1560-1617.
notes: A translation of: Theorica y practica de guerra.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.

keywords: Military art and science --  Early works to 1800.
